alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...CLUSTER OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS NEAR SPENCER MOVING NORTHEAST TOWARD ASHTON AND ISLAND PARK THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms extending from 13 miles west of Henrys Lake to 6 miles southwest of Idmon to near Hamer, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph. Occasional lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dubois, Idmon, Henrys Lake, Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Kilgore, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Sheridan Reservoir, Targhee Pass, Harriman State Park, Red Rock Pass and Big Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain
